text: Howls of the Wolves

Benhardt's personal friend Eric Ragnar has requested aid, he has been tasked with defeating a fearsome foe but is light on troops. Ragnar will gladfully join Bernhardt should he help finish this contract.
Bleak Times

Eusebio's Flagellants have served the Grudgebringers well before, but find themselves stalked by some twisted evil. If we can save them they will gladly end their pilgrimage of self-flagellation and join us, safety in numbers after all.
Breakout Bloodfist
An old friend Azguz Bloodfist's find his path back to the Dwarven Holds blocked, if we help him he will join our cause once he has reported back to his liege.
Under Siege

Dargrimm Firebeard's warriors are under seige in a nearby Dawi hold. He has asked that while your forces not great enough to relieve them if you can weaken the enemy. This would force the besiegers to divert their forces allowing the Dawi forces to sally out.
Rotgut's Rotten Deal

Urblab Rotgut has found himself and his band of Mercenary Ogres tricked with a burdensome contract and find themselves indentured for the forseeable future. If we help them finish their contract they will happily join us and let us deal with making the "Tough" contract negotiations.
Orion's Support - I
Orion will offer you what aid he can but Loren is beleaguered on all sides. Weaken the forces of the undead and he will reinforce you with a regiment of thier finest Glade Guards.
Orion's Support - II

As part of Orions promised support, he has asked you deal with the most pressing threat. Swarms of undead rolling in from the Grey Mountains flooding the forest. Thin them out and Orion will reward with thier finest archers who have served with you before and will do so again to the bitter end.
Fort Helmgart
The old fort is under constant attack from the mountain undead, help them and the Garrison commander has promised you a regiment of the garrison, the Helmgart Bowmen.
A Longshot
Under the service of a local ruler, Johann Keeler's Longbows have said they will join you, if you assist in finishing their current contract.
Vermin Revenge

With their families slain and their home burnt, the survivors have banded together with only one mission, kill the Rat-men. Their leader Ramon Black has said if you bring them 300 Rat-heads they will join you knowing they will kill many more vermin under your command.
Secure the Border Princes

The Border Princes are in desperate need of aid, hordes of Greenskins have swarmed into their lands. We battle night and day to protect the passes into the Empire but the enemy is too numerous. Without reinforcements they will soon be overwhelmed and the Empire itself threatened, help them and Sven Carlsson will place a regiment of his guards under your command.
Rogue Border Prince

Sven Carlsson wishes to gain your services in capturing a rogue Border Prince that conspires with inhuman creatures against us. His name is Otto Hiln, each month, for the last three, he has been meeting in the Worlds Edge Mountains with Skaven. Since that first meeting he has sent out men searching for one called Ceridan, but as the months have passed with no word of Ceridan, Hiln has become increasingly frustrated to the point of executing those who report failure. A former bodyguard of Hiln's, sickened by his former master collabrations with the Rat-Men hordes has provided the whereabouts of their next meeting
The Crows Always Win
Siegfried Vanhiem has found himself in a bloody and drawn out conflict, if we can end this war he will offer his services to us.
Polluting Spirit

A treeman desires our aid in preventing undead forces from entering the forest and polluting the spirit of the trees. Help him and the Treeman will leave tend his tree no longer and will fight by your side.
Gnawing Rats
Skaven Plauge Monks are attacking the Forests of Loren, killing the trees and animals with their putrid filth. You must cleanse our home of them before the forest is damaged beyond repair.
Imperial Aid - I
The Empire has put a contract on this most vile foe, succeed and they will aid you with one of the finest Imperial Mortars.
Rescue the Countess

Countess Isabella Isabella Von Liberhurtz has been kidnapped while en-route on a diplomatic mission. It is the Emperor Karl Franz's wish you rescue his cousin without delay. While her Guard were cut-down in her defense, a few survived including their wounded leader Heinz Klemper. While he recovers and gathers troops, they use all their existing resources to track the Countess' abductees. If you are able to free the Countess, her Guard will join you once they have recovered to full strength.
Imperial Aid - II
The Empire is under threat by a dangerous enemy, defeat them and the Empire will see you joined by one of their finest Greatswords units who have served under your command before.
Personal Grudge

The infamous outlaw Jurgen Muntz, wishes to join up with a mercenary army that pays well. He has a particular grudge that needs settling and the mercs that can fufill his wish, will see him and his men join them for aslong as the pay is plentiful.
A Mercenaries Life

Boris von Raukov, has secured himself command over a regiment of Halberdiers, he seeks distinction and glory but his superiors in Nuln will only allow him to join you if you extinguish a potenial threat to Wissenland.
Money or your Life

Stephan Weiss looks to have tried to rob the wrong people, he is currently imprisoned but managed to send a message asking us to free him. Should we manage this feat Stephan's Pistoliers will be in our service and debt to the end.
Imperial Aid - III
The Empire requests aid against a brutal enemy, defeat them and you will be rewarded with one of the Empires finest cannons.
Unholy Secret

King Leoncoeur will only suggest we search the city of Mousillion, the city of the Decayed and Damned, a place the Bretonnian armies even avoid like the plague. If we cleanse this evil the King will support us with a regiment of Grail Knights, on the condition they are only used agaisnt the enemies of Bretonnia.
Broken Axe

The lands of Bretonnia are no stranger to Orc incursions, but some are too much even for their knights. As such a local King has requested aid against a vicious tribe that reside in the Massif Orcal Mountains, our reward a regiment of Knights of the Realm to be used only against Bretonnia's foes.
Ludwig von Uberdorf

A Steam Tank has been damaged, broken down en-route to exterminate a rabble of Greenskins who have taken over some Imperial Towers. They find themselves isolated, with their escort Halberdiers killed by Orc patrols, we must protect them while they make their repairs. The Tank Commander will be at your service until the repairs are finished at which point the Steam Tank will be placed under your command.
Ceridan

Posing as Ilmarin, an advisor to the Border Prince Sven Carlsson, he has revealed his true identity as Ceridan of the Black Mountains. He has important business in Loren and asks for your help. Though he is willing to postpone his business in order to aid his good friend Carlsson and the Border Princes who deserve a better fate than the one that lay ahead. But after that he insists we leave for Loren immediatley!
Stormbringer

Her Imperial Highness, has sent Vladimir Stormbringer, Ice Mage to Tzarina Katarin at the palace of Kislev as your formal escort through her lands. He will ride with you and his skills as an ice mage are at your service against the strange fearsome beings, of which the peasants of the region call the cursed ones, cold dead who eat warm living flesh.
Goldtongue
Lord Ungrunn has placed his envoy Engrol Goldtongue at your service. On your travels he will also be undertaking diplomatic missions on behalf of Zhufbar.
Matthias

The Emperor Karl Franz fearing the growing evil that lurks in the Empire and beyond has requested our presence at Altdorf, our task, to seek out and destroy any and all evil wherever we find it. Arriving with the same messenger is correspondence from the Witch Hunter General Mathias who Bernhardt shares a bitter history with. The letter states that a spiritual amateur like Bernhardt isn’t capable of accomplishing such a task unaided. That he could easily fall foul to devilish traps and infernal spells. That he however being pure in sprit and immune to demonic tricks, is the only one who can ensure this missions success. This drivel continues until the letter concludes that should Bernhard bother to come to Altdorf, under the authority of the Emperor himself, Mathias will join us just as long as there aren’t any heretics to burn.
Flamestrike

Rabid Wolves have been praying on livestock and a few unfortunate locals. Flamestrike has been hired to bring an an end to this menace. While he has managed to hold them at bay, he has been unable to drive them off completely despite leaving a few dozen of their number as smouldering carcasses. The arrival of your army should make quick work of scaring these mutts back into the forest where they belong. Luther would gladly then offer his services as a master of the magic arts… for a reasonable price.
